novice

Class Segd

  • java.lang.Object
    • novice.Segd

  • public class Segd
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Segd.

    Tools for working with collections of Segdata objects. Contains static methods for working with .segd files.

    Since:
    April 13, 2014
